name: ideia-virtual-shop
description: IdeiaERP Commerce Sync - Sistema de sincronização bidirecional entre IdeiaERP e lojas virtuais

scripts.build:api:win: npx nx build api && cd dist/apps/api && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const rootPkg=require('../../../package.json');const newPkg={name:'api',version:'0.0.1',main:'./src/main.js',type:'commonjs',dependencies:rootPkg.dependencies};fs.writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(newPkg,null,2));" && npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps && npx pkg src/main.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output ../../ideiaerp-sync-win.exe
scripts.build:api:linux: npx nx build api && cd dist/apps/api && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const rootPkg=require('../../../package.json');const newPkg={name:'api',version:'0.0.1',main:'./src/main.js',type:'commonjs',dependencies:rootPkg.dependencies};fs.writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(newPkg,null,2));" && npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps && npx pkg src/main.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ../../ideiaerp-sync-linux
scripts.build:api:macos: npx nx build api && cd dist/apps/api && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const rootPkg=require('../../../package.json');const newPkg={name:'api',version:'0.0.1',main:'./src/main.js',type:'commonjs',bin:{'ideiaerp-sync':'./src/main.js'},dependencies:rootPkg.dependencies};fs.writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(newPkg,null,2));" && npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps && npx pkg package.json --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ../../../ideiaerp-sync-macos
scripts.build:api:macos:nexe: npx nx build api && cd dist/apps/api && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const rootPkg=require('../../../package.json');const newPkg={name:'api',version:'0.0.1',main:'./src/main.js',type:'commonjs',dependencies:rootPkg.dependencies};fs.writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(newPkg,null,2));" && npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps && npx nexe src/main.js -t macos-x64-18.5.0 -o ../../../ideiaerp-sync-macos
